name: South Africa — The Wild Soul of Africa
metaTitle: South Africa Tour Package | Cape Town & Safari with Duniya Dekho
metaDescription: Explore South Africa with Duniya Dekho. Visit Cape Town, Table Mountain, Cape of Good Hope, and experience a thrilling safari at Kruger National Park.
description: Discover the beauty of South Africa on this 11-day tour! Begin your adventure in Cape Town, exploring the iconic Table Mountain, the historic Robben Island, and the scenic Cape of Good Hope.

Travel along the stunning Garden Route, visit Stellenbosch & the Winelands, and enjoy the vibrant city life in Durban and Johannesburg. Experience the thrill of a safari in Kruger National Park, spotting Africa's Big Five in their natural habitat.

additionalInfo.name: Geography and Climate
additionalInfo.description: South Africa offers a diverse landscape ranging from beaches and mountains to savannahs and deserts. The country experiences a generally temperate climate with warm summers and mild winters, making it ideal for sightseeing and safari adventures throughout the year.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Cape Town
itinerary.description: Arrive at Cape Town International Airport and transfer to your hotel. Relax and enjoy the rest of the day at leisure or explore the local surroundings.

itinerary.title: Cape Town City Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on a full-day city tour of Cape Town. Visit Table Mountain, Robben Island, Victoria & Alfred Waterfront, and enjoy the scenic views of the city.

itinerary.title: Cape Peninsula & Cape of Good Hope
itinerary.description: Take a full-day tour of the Cape Peninsula, including Hout Bay, Boulders Beach Penguin Colony, and the Cape of Good Hope. Enjoy panoramic ocean views along the way.

itinerary.title: Stellenbosch & Winelands
itinerary.description: Drive to the Cape Winelands and explore the picturesque town of Stellenbosch. Enjoy wine tasting at renowned vineyards and immerse yourself in the local culture.
additionalInfo: Overnight stay in Stellenbosch or Cape Town

itinerary.title: Garden Route Drive
itinerary.description: Depart for the famous Garden Route, visiting scenic spots like Knysna, Plettenberg Bay, and Tsitsikamma National Park. Enjoy the breathtaking coastal scenery along the way.
additionalInfo: Overnight stay in Garden Route area

itinerary.title: Continue Garden Route & Adventure Activities
itinerary.description: Explore more of the Garden Route with options for adventure activities such as bungee jumping at Bloukrans Bridge, canopy tours, or boat trips along the lagoon.
additionalInfo: Overnight stay in Garden Route area

itinerary.title: Flight to Durban
itinerary.description: Take a flight to Durban. Spend the afternoon relaxing on Durban’s Golden Mile beach or exploring the vibrant city markets.

itinerary.title: Durban to Johannesburg
itinerary.description: After breakfast, fly to Johannesburg. On arrival, enjoy a city tour including Soweto and the Apartheid Museum.

itinerary.title: Kruger National Park Safari
itinerary.description: Drive or fly to Kruger National Park for a thrilling safari adventure. Spot wildlife including lions, elephants, rhinos, leopards, and buffalos.
additionalInfo: Overnight stay near Kruger National Park

itinerary.title: Full Day Safari in Kruger National Park
itinerary.description: Enjoy a full day safari in Kruger National Park. Experience the beauty of South African wildlife and landscapes on guided game drives.
additionalInfo: Overnight stay near Kruger National Park

itinerary.title: Departure from Johannesburg
itinerary.description: After breakfast, transfer to Johannesburg Airport for your onward journey, concluding your South Africa Highlights tour.

name: Egypt — Land of Wonders & Wisdom
metaTitle: Egypt Tour Package | Cairo, Luxor & Nile Cruise with Duniya Dekho
metaDescription: Discover Egypt with Duniya Dekho. Visit the Pyramids of Giza, Sphinx, Luxor Temples, and enjoy a serene Nile River cruise.
description: Explore the land of Pharaohs and ancient wonders! Begin your journey in Cairo with a 2-night stay, marveling at the Pyramids of Giza, Sphinx, and the Egyptian Museum, immersing yourself in Egypt's rich history.

Then, travel to Luxor for a 2-night stay, experiencing the grandeur of Karnak and Luxor Temples, Valley of the Kings, and the majestic Nile River. Conclude your journey with a relaxing Nile Cruise and discover Egypt's timeless charm.

additionalInfo.name: Geography and Climate
additionalInfo.description: Egypt is located in North Africa with desert landscapes, the Nile River, and Mediterranean coastline. It has a hot desert climate, with extremely hot summers, mild winters, and very little rainfall throughout the year.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Cairo
itinerary.description: Arrive at Cairo International Airport and transfer to your hotel. Relax and explore local surroundings at leisure.

itinerary.title: Pyramids and Sphinx Tour
itinerary.description: After breakfast, visit the iconic Pyramids of Giza, the Sphinx, and take a camel ride. Later, explore the Egyptian Museum to witness ancient artifacts and treasures.

itinerary.title: Flight to Luxor & East Bank Tour
itinerary.description: Take a morning flight to Luxor. Explore the Karnak Temple and Luxor Temple. Enjoy the local markets in the evening.

itinerary.title: West Bank Tour
itinerary.description: Visit the Valley of the Kings, Temple of Hatshepsut, and Colossi of Memnon. Return to your hotel and relax.

itinerary.title: Nile Cruise
itinerary.description: Embark on a Nile Cruise. Enjoy the scenic views along the river and visit temples along the way.
additionalInfo: Overnight stay on board Nile Cruise

itinerary.title: Return to Cairo
itinerary.description: Disembark from the Nile Cruise and fly back to Cairo. Spend your evening at leisure or shopping at local bazaars.

itinerary.title: Departure from Cairo
itinerary.description: After breakfast, transfer to Cairo Airport for your onward journey. Tour ends here.

name: Kenya & Victoria Falls — A Journey Through Wildlife, Waterfalls & Wonders
metaTitle: Kenya & Victoria Falls Tour Package | Safari & Waterfalls with Duniya Dekho
metaDescription: Experience the wild beauty of Kenya and the majestic Victoria Falls with Duniya Dekho. Go on thrilling safaris, explore wildlife, and witness the spectacular waterfalls.
description: Explore the wild landscapes of Kenya with its vast savannas and abundant wildlife! Start in Nairobi with a 2-night stay, visiting Nairobi National Park and the David Sheldrick Wildlife Trust.

Then, travel to Maasai Mara for a thrilling 3-night safari, spotting lions, elephants, giraffes, and other exotic animals. Conclude your journey at Victoria Falls with a 2-night stay, marveling at the magnificent waterfalls and enjoying optional adventure activities.

additionalInfo.name: Geography and Climate
additionalInfo.description: Kenya is located in East Africa, featuring savannas, lakes, and mountains. It has a tropical climate, with warm temperatures year-round and seasonal rains. Victoria Falls, on the Zambia-Zimbabwe border, experiences a subtropical climate with wet and dry seasons.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Nairobi
itinerary.description: Arrive at Jomo Kenyatta International Airport, Nairobi. Transfer to your hotel and relax after your journey.

itinerary.title: Nairobi Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Visit Nairobi National Park, David Sheldrick Wildlife Trust, and Giraffe Centre. Explore local markets in the evening.

itinerary.title: Drive to Maasai Mara
itinerary.description: Travel to Maasai Mara National Reserve. Check-in at your safari lodge and enjoy your first game drive in the afternoon.
additionalInfo: Overnight stay in Maasai Mara lodge

itinerary.title: Full-Day Safari in Maasai Mara
itinerary.description: Embark on morning and afternoon game drives in Maasai Mara. Spot the Big Five and enjoy the spectacular landscapes.
additionalInfo: Overnight stay in Maasai Mara lodge

itinerary.title: Safari & Cultural Visit
itinerary.description: Enjoy another morning safari in Maasai Mara. Later, visit a Maasai village to learn about local culture and traditions.
additionalInfo: Overnight stay in Maasai Mara lodge

itinerary.title: Flight to Victoria Falls
itinerary.description: Fly to Victoria Falls. Check-in at your hotel and spend the evening exploring the surrounding area or enjoying hotel amenities.
additionalInfo: Overnight stay in Victoria Falls hotel

itinerary.title: Victoria Falls Exploration
itinerary.description: Visit the magnificent Victoria Falls. Optional activities include a helicopter ride, river cruise, or bungee jumping for adventure seekers.
additionalInfo: Overnight stay in Victoria Falls hotel

itinerary.title: Departure from Victoria Falls
itinerary.description: After breakfast, transfer to Victoria Falls Airport for your onward journey. Tour ends here.

name: Tanzania — The Heart of Safari
metaTitle: Tanzania Tour Package | Serengeti, Ngorongoro & Zanzibar with Duniya Dekho
metaDescription: Explore Tanzania with Duniya Dekho. Witness the Serengeti wildlife, Ngorongoro Crater, and relax on the beaches of Zanzibar.
description: Discover the wonders of Tanzania! Begin your journey in Arusha with a 1-night stay before heading into the wild for an unforgettable safari experience in Serengeti and Ngorongoro Crater.

Experience the abundant wildlife, breathtaking landscapes, and traditional Maasai culture. Conclude your trip with a relaxing beach stay in Zanzibar, enjoying pristine beaches and crystal-clear waters.

additionalInfo.name: Geography and Climate
additionalInfo.description: Tanzania is located in East Africa, known for its savannas, highlands, and tropical islands. It has a tropical climate, with wet and dry seasons. Serengeti and Ngorongoro are best visited during the dry season, while Zanzibar has warm tropical beaches year-round.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Arusha
itinerary.description: Arrive at Kilimanjaro International Airport. Transfer to your hotel and rest after your journey.

itinerary.title: Drive to Serengeti
itinerary.description: Travel to Serengeti National Park. Begin your safari and enjoy your first wildlife sightings.

itinerary.title: Full-Day Safari in Serengeti
itinerary.description: Explore the Serengeti plains on morning and afternoon game drives. Spot lions, elephants, cheetahs, and other exotic animals.

itinerary.title: Serengeti to Ngorongoro Crater
itinerary.description: Drive to Ngorongoro Crater. Enjoy a scenic game drive inside the crater and explore the wildlife-rich ecosystem.

itinerary.title: Ngorongoro to Tarangire
itinerary.description: Travel to Tarangire National Park for a safari experience famous for elephants and baobab trees.

itinerary.title: Drive to Zanzibar
itinerary.description: Fly or drive to Zanzibar. Check-in at your beach hotel and relax by the pristine beaches.

itinerary.title: Zanzibar Beach Leisure
itinerary.description: Spend the day at leisure on Zanzibar beaches or opt for snorkeling, spice farm visit, or a boat trip.

itinerary.title: Zanzibar Island Exploration
itinerary.description: Explore Stone Town, local markets, and cultural landmarks. Enjoy the tropical sunset and beachside activities.

itinerary.title: Departure from Zanzibar
itinerary.description: After breakfast, transfer to Zanzibar Airport for your onward journey. Tour ends here.

name: Australia — Adventure
metaTitle: Australia Tour Package | Sydney, Melbourne & Great Barrier Reef with Duniya Dekho
metaDescription: Explore Australia with Duniya Dekho. Visit Sydney, Melbourne, the Great Barrier Reef, and experience iconic landmarks, wildlife, and vibrant cities.
description: Embark on an unforgettable adventure through the breathtaking landscapes of Australia, exploring the charming city of Melbourne, the stunning Great Ocean Road, and the majestic Grampians National Park. Begin in Melbourne, Victoria's vibrant capital, before winding your way along the iconic Great Ocean Road to Apollo Bay, with its pristine beaches and lush rainforests. Continue to Warrnambool, renowned for its whale watching opportunities and historic landmarks, and then on to Halls Gap, nestled in the heart of the Grampians National Park, where towering mountains, sparkling waterfalls, and an abundance of wildlife await. Return to Melbourne for a final night, reflecting on the unforgettable experiences and memories made during your journey through one of Australia's most stunning regions.

additionalInfo.name: Geography and Climate
additionalInfo.description: Australia, the world's sixth-largest country, boasts a diverse geography, ranging from the red sands of the Outback to the lush rainforests of the north and the snow-capped mountains of the southeast. The country's climate varies greatly, from tropical in the north to temperate in the south, with the central desert region experiencing extreme temperatures and low humidity. The northern states, including Queensland and the Northern Territory, have a wet and dry season, while the southern states, such as New South Wales and Victoria, have a more moderate climate with four distinct seasons.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Melbourne and Yarra River Cruise
itinerary.description: Welcome to Melbourne, the vibrant cultural capital of Australia! Begin your journey by delving into the city's rich First Nations heritage. Make your way to South Wharf, where you'll embark on a scenic 1-hour Yarra River Cruise. As you glide along the river, take in the stunning city skyline, picturesque gardens, and historic landmarks, setting the tone for an unforgettable adventure in Melbourne. Overnight at your hotel in Melbourne.

itinerary.title: Melbourne City Tour and Skydeck Experience
itinerary.description: After breakfast, start your day with a comprehensive Look Around City tour, showcasing Melbourne's iconic landmarks and hidden gems. Visit the legendary Melbourne Cricket Ground (MCG) and take an insider's tour, exploring the stadium's historic pavilions, player facilities, and the hallowed turf. In the evening, head to the Melbourne Skydeck, located on the 88th floor of the Eureka Tower. Enjoy the thrilling Edge Experience, a glass cube that extends 3 meters outside the building, and take in breathtaking 360-degree views of the city. Additionally, explore the Voyager Theatre, featuring a unique, interactive experience that tells the story of Melbourne's history and culture. Overnight at your hotel in Melbourne.

itinerary.title: Melbourne to Apollo Bay via Great Ocean Road
itinerary.description: Pick up your rental car and embark on an epic journey along Victoria's stunning Great Ocean Road. Your first stop is Bells Beach, a world-renowned surf spot and home of the Rip Curl Pro surfing competition. Visit the Great Ocean Road Chocolaterie & Ice Creamery for a sweet treat.Continue driving to the charming beach towns of Anglesea and Aireys Inlet. Take a scenic walk to the Split Point Lighthouse in Aireys Inlet, offering breathtaking views of the coastal cliffs. Next, head to Lorne, a picturesque seaside town with unique shops, cafes, and scenic waterfalls, including Erskine Falls and Sheoak Falls.In the afternoon, drive to Apollo Bay, a quaint fishing town surrounded by the majestic Great Otway National Park. Check-in to your hotel and stroll along the town's beautiful beach. Explore the national park's scenic trails, visit the Otway Fly Tree Top walk, or discover the Wild Life Wonders of the region. Overnight at your hotel in Apollo Bay.

itinerary.title: Apollo Bay to Warrnambool via Great Ocean Road
itinerary.description: Depart Apollo Bay and continue along the stunning Great Ocean Road, stopping at one of its most iconic attractions: The Twelve Apostles limestone rock pillars. Take an optional helicopter ride for a thrilling bird's-eye view of these natural wonders. Visit Loch Ard Gorge, a picturesque cove with a tragic history, and marvel at the dramatic London Arch, a popular natural landmark. Nearby, explore the Grotto sinkhole, where you can peer into the void and witness the ocean's fury.In the afternoon, arrive in Warrnambool, a charming coastal city steeped in history. Visit the Flagstaff Hill Maritime Village, where you'll discover a recreated 19th-century port village. Be mesmerized by the Shipwrecked Sound and Laser Show, and explore the Shipwrecked Museum, showcasing the region's rich maritime heritage. Overnight at your hotel in Warrnambool.

itinerary.title: Warrnambool to Halls Gap via Grampians National Park
itinerary.description: Embark on a scenic two-hour drive to the breathtaking Grampians National Park, one of Australia's most spectacular nature reserves. Explore the park's rugged sandstone ridges, visiting iconic attractions like MacKenzie Falls and the Brambuk Cultural Centre, which showcases the region's rich Aboriginal heritage. Indulge in a wine tasting experience at a local vineyard estate, such as Pomonal Estate or Great Western Estate. Keep an eye out for the diverse wildlife that inhabits the park, including deer, foxes, hares, and even dingoes.As you journey through the Grampians, marvel at the dramatic mountain landscapes, with smooth slopes on the west and rugged crags on the east. Arrive in the charming village of Halls Gap, nestled in the heart of the national park, where wild kangaroos roam freely. Overnight at your hotel in Halls Gap.

itinerary.title: Canoeing and Exploring the Grampians
itinerary.description: Embark on a serene canoeing adventure in the breathtaking Grampians National Park. Depart Halls Gap and head to a stunning lake, such as Bellfield or Fyans, where you'll meet your local guide. Paddle leisurely across the lake, taking in the picturesque surroundings and spotting native wildlife, including black swans, cormorants, and ducks.After your canoeing excursion, return to Halls Gap and spend the afternoon at leisure. Optional activities include guided hikes to scenic mountain lookout points and waterfalls, or visiting a First Nations cultural center to delve deeper into the region's rich Aboriginal heritage. Overnight at your hotel in Halls Gap.

itinerary.title: Return to Melbourne via Stawell and Ballarat
itinerary.description: Bid farewell to the Grampians and embark on a scenic drive back to Melbourne. En route, stop at the Black Range Scenic Reserve to visit the Bunjil Shelter, featuring ancient First Nations rock art. Take a short walk to the shelter and marvel at the thousands-year-old artwork depicting Bunjil, a revered creator deity.Next, head to Ballarat, Victoria's largest inland city, and indulge in its vibrant arts scene, diverse cuisine, and rich history. Visit Sovereign Hill, a living museum that recreates 1851 Ballarat, complete with costumed characters and historic architecture. Try your luck at gold panning, explore underground mine tours, and relive the excitement of the gold rush era. After a fascinating day in Ballarat, depart for Melbourne, reflecting on the unforgettable experiences and memories made during your journey. Overnight at your hotel in Melbourne.

itinerary.title: Departure from Melbourne
itinerary.description: Spend the morning at leisure, exploring Melbourne's vibrant streets, revisiting favorite attractions, or discovering new hidden gems. As your journey comes to a close, make your way to Melbourne Airport, returning your rental car to the depot.Bid farewell to Melbourne and Australia, carrying memories of your unforgettable adventure. Depart from Melbourne Airport, heading home or to your next destination. Safe travels!

additionalInfo.name: Geography and Climate

itinerary.title: Arrival in Istanbul
itinerary.description: Arrive at Istanbul Airport and transfer to your hotel. Evening free to explore local bazaars.

itinerary.title: Istanbul City Tour
itinerary.description: Visit Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque, Hippodrome Square, and Grand Bazaar.
